channel.title: Libraries on Pen programming language
channel.description: Recent content in Libraries on Pen programming language

item.title: Core
item.description: Core Background () Given a file named “pen.json” with: { "dependencies": { "Core": "file://pen-root/lib/core" } } Convert a number to a string Given a file named “Foo.pen” with: import Core'Number f = \() string { Number'String(42) } When I run pen build Then the exit status should be 0. Join strings Given a file named “Foo.pen” with: import Core'String f = \() string { String'Join([string; "hello", "world"]) } When I run pen build
